inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed anaplastic astrocytoma on the tentorium at first relapse
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter

inclusion.criterion: unequivocal evidence of tumor recurrence or aggravation by MRI scan after treatment for initial onset
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma

inclusion.criterion: anaplastic astrocytoma diagnosed histologically by the last pathological diagnostic tests (including initial diagnosis) prior to initial administration of temozolomide
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma

inclusion.criterion: tissue samples available for Central Pathologic Reviewer
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: pathologic diagnosis report by the study-conducting medical institution must be available for the sponsor
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: MRI scan performed within 14 days before initial temozolomide administration
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI scan performed within 14 days before initial temozolomide administration; assessable tumor site confirmed by MRI

inclusion.criterion: age >=18 years, either sex, inpatients or outpatients
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who received chemotherapy within 6 weeks before initial temozolomide administration
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who completed radiotherapy within 12 weeks before initial temozolomide administration
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Unknown: tissue samples available for Central Pathologic Reviewer, pathologic diagnosis report by the study-conducting medical institution must be available for the sponsor, Karnofsky performance status >=70
